snippet.title: Climber Sky is the Limit -  Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ever wanted to climb the highest peaks on Earth? Do it in this mountain climbing simulator. Soon on Xbox!

Climber: Sky is the Limit is a game with a unique mixture of survival and simulation. The player takes control of a climber who takes on the most difficult and dangerous peaks on earth. To succeed you need to plan your journey carefully by preparing appropriate equipment, choosing a suitable trail, facing extreme weather conditions, and surviving. Conquer your limits, overcome your fear and reach the sky!

#idxbox #idatxbox
